mapper.select: SELECT idx AS image_idx, origin_filename, url FROM IMAGE WHERE thumbnail_yn='Y' AND type = "P" AND mapping_idx = #{partner_idx}

SELECT rs.idx AS reservation_idx, rm.room_type, rs.check_in_date, rs.check_out_date, rs.guest_cnt, rs.price, img.url, img.origin_filename, CASE WHEN rs.check_in_date >= CURDATE() THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS check_date, rs.payment_status FROM RESERVATION rs JOIN ROOM rm ON(rs.room_idx = rm.idx) JOIN IMAGE img ON(rs.room_idx = img.mapping_idx) WHERE img.type = 'R' AND img.thumbnail_yn = 'Y' AND rs.idx = #{reservation_idx}
